advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Get the #1 Vegas-Like experience in the best FREE to Play Casino! 
Travel to amazing game-packed Casa Casino locations around the world and WIN BIG! Enjoy an endless variety of land-based style slots with magical, never seen before BONUS rounds and our one of a kind multiplayer FORTUNE WHEEL game!

Play the exclusive Gods and Glory™ Slot with Wild pay-outs and our GIANT Fortune Wheel™.

Join the thousands of players who are already winning today!

TOP FEATURES:

* TONS of Land-Based style Slots
* Gods and Glory™, a MUST play Machine for all Slot players!
* FREE to Play, Every Day!
* Generous Free Chip bonuses!
* A variety of casinos full of games!
* New games every 2 weeks
* Login with Facebook, or play the full game as a Guest
releaseNotes:
We listened to all your amazing feedback and fixed a TON of pressing issues along with a feature many of you asked for! So thanks for your love and patience!

* New Casino - Marrakesh!
* AUTO SPINS! Just sit back, relax, and spin!
* NEW BIG symbols on some of your favorite machines!
* NEW AMAZING animations and more beautiful updates to the slots you love most!
* Bug fixes to issues from the previous version
